task.title: Configure Actions, Menus, and Toolbars for a Framework

context.p: You can configure actions, menus, and toolbars that are specific to a framework (document type) in the Author mode to gain a productive editing experience, by using the Document Type configuration dialog box.
To add or configure actions, menus, or toolbars follow this procedure:

step.cmd: , go to Document Types Association, and select the framework for which you want to create an action.
Click Edit and in the Document Type configuration dialog box go to the Author tab, then go to Actions.
Click the New button and use the Action dialog box to create an action.
